whatIs.title: What is Breeding Journey?
whatIs.description: Breeding Journey is a comprehensive digital platform designed specifically for dog breeders who are passionate about maintaining detailed records and ensuring the best care for their breeding programs.

breeding.title: Breeding Management
breeding.description: Plan and track your breeding programs with detailed records of parent dogs, genetic information, and breeding schedules.

pregnancy.title: Pregnancy Tracking
pregnancy.description: Monitor every stage of pregnancy with detailed logs, health checkups, and milestone tracking.

litters.title: Litter Management
litters.description: Keep comprehensive records of each litter including individual puppy profiles, health records, and development tracking.

health.title: Health Records
health.description: Maintain detailed health histories, vaccination records, and medical documentation for all your dogs.

comprehensive.title: Comprehensive Records
comprehensive.description: Everything in one place - from breeding plans to puppy records.

easyToUse.title: Easy to Use
easyToUse.description: Intuitive interface designed specifically for breeders' needs.

secure.title: Secure & Reliable
secure.description: Your data is safely stored and always accessible when you need it.

support.title: Dedicated Support
support.description: Expert support from people who understand breeding.
